title: Lemon syllabub tart
ingredients: ['8 to 10 digestive biscuits, crushed', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', '40g (1 1/2 oz) butter, melted', '1 teaspoon mixed spice (optional)', '2 lemons', '150ml (1/4 pt) double cream', '1 small tin sweetened condensed milk', '110g (4 oz) black grapes, for decoration']
